Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize()
Initialize platform-specific driver.

This method does the following

  • Load's JNI shareable object library
  • Clears list of CommPortIdentifier objects and portmapping entries.
  • Refreshes portmapping entries and CommPortIdentifier list.

initialize in interface CommDriver
